title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       The Blue Ridge Parkway has something for everyone. Whether you like to hike or prefer to enjoy a nice picnic, the Parkway offers a great range of activities for you to enjoy. If you'd like to be involved in park events, see our schedule of events.        Camping There are eight campgrounds that serve the Blue Ridge Parkway. Read more           Ranger-Led Programs Join a Park Ranger for walks, hikes, and campfire programs. Read more         Kayaking/ Canoeing Julian Price Park offers wonderful opportunities for boating on Price Lake. Read more         Music The Parkway offers a peek into the regions historical music background at the Blue Ridge Music Center. Read more         Hiking There are over 360 miles of hiking trails along the Blue Ridge Parkway. Read more         Picnicking Unpack your basket at 13 picnic areas throughout the park. Read more         Photography There are many chances to snap your favorite picture along the Parkway. Read more         Bicycling Ride the Parkway on two wheels under your own power. Read more         Other There are many more activities to do along the Parkway... Stop by a visitor center for more information or check the calendar to find out about special events.
